title: sap.fe.macros.chart.Chart
content:
# sap.fe.macros.chart.Chart

Building block used to create a chart based on the metadata provided by OData V4.
Usually, a contextPath and metaPath is expected.
Usage example: 

sap.ui.require(["sap/fe/macros/chart/Chart"], function(Chart) {
	 ...
	 new Chart("myChart", {metaPath:"MyChart"})
})

This is currently an experimental API because the structure of the generated content will change to come closer to the Chart that you get out of templates. The public method and property will not change but the internal structure will so be careful on your usage.

**Type:** class **Module:** sap/fe/macros/chart/Chart ## Methods ### getContextPath

Gets current value of property contextPath.

### getCurrentVariantKey

Gets the key of the current variant in the associated variant management.

### getFilterBar

Gets current value of property filterBar.

### getHeader

Gets current value of property header.

### getHeaderVisible

Gets current value of property headerVisible.

### getMetaPath

Gets current value of property metaPath.

### getPersonalization

Gets current value of property personalization.

### getPresentationVariant

Get the presentation variant that is currently applied on the chart.

### getSelectedContexts

Gets contexts from the chart that have been selected by the user.

### getSelectionMode

Gets current value of property selectionMode.

### getSelectionVariant

Get the selection variant from the chart. This function considers only the selection variant applied at the control level.

### getVariantManagement

Gets current value of property variantManagement.

### setContextPath

Gets current value of property contextPath.

### setCurrentVariantKey

Sets the variant of the provided key in the associated variant management.

### setFilterBar

Gets current value of property filterBar.

### setHeader

Gets current value of property header.

### setHeaderVisible

Gets current value of property headerVisible.

### setMetaPath

Gets current value of property metaPath.

### setPersonalization

Gets current value of property personalization.

### setPresentationVariant

Set the presentation variant for the mdc chart.
The json format retrieved by using the get PresentationVariant button in the linked FPM sample should be followed while trying to set the PresentationVariant as needed. The values dimensions, measures and other properties should also be given in the valid format and null or empty values should be avoided. One dimension attribute should have only one role associated with it on a given chart.

### setSelectionMode

Gets current value of property selectionMode.

### setSelectionVariant

Sets sap.fe.navigation.SelectionVariant to the chart. Note: setSelectionVariant will clear existing filters and then apply the SelectionVariant values.

### setVariantManagement

Gets current value of property variantManagement.
